game.name: Tetroid 2
game.description:
Fun gets double when you check out the second version of this popular addictive block puzzle game! Click the play button to enter the amazing fun-filled environment that is surrounded by the magical Christmas/winter theme! Your task will remain the same as you did in its first version. Drag and drop the elements shown at the bottom of the screen in the 10 x 10 board in Tetroid 2! Do not take it easy as scoring high needs skill and focus.

Clear the line by making the horizontal or vertical lines in this HTML5 block challenge! Keep clearing the lines until your board does not have enough space for the elements to move around! Go through all the square options available on the screen and combine them into a whole column or a whole row to make the entire column or row of squares disappear! There is no need to put stress on your mind as your puzzle-solving abilities can help you to score big in this popular tetris-style game.

The improved interface and new features of this cute puzzle challenge will be enough to keep you engrossed for hours. Common friends! You have the skills to convert your efforts into points by building as many straight lines of multi-colored blocks as you can. Use your logic and attentiveness to make a difference! Our extensive collection of free online Christmas games can allow you to find some funny and engaging hours to beat your boredom.
